I love how this torrent already has so many seeds and leeches! It's like everyone kept refreshing until this was finally uploaded by someone. That just proves that it's a good game. Oh and it's an indie game too. It took the guy three years to make it. So, how about this: Let's all go buy the game when we get the money. Oh, I am a pirate at heart. But some rare occasions like these just make me want to buy the game. That's exactly what I'm going to do. In about 30 minutes time.
